articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Sensex closes above 66,000-mark for first time led by IT stocks; Nifty tops 19,550 - The Economic Times
articles.description: From the Sensex pack, IT stocks such as TCS, Tech Mahindra, Infosys, HCL Tech, and Wipro are among the top gainers, rising 3-5%. Tata Steel, Nestle, HUL, Asian Paints, and ICICI Bank close higher. The market breadth is skewed in favour of the bulls. About 2,2…
articles.content: Benchmark equity indices recorded fresh lifetime highs on Friday mainly because IT stocks benefited from increasing hopes that the US Federal Reserve would pause rate hikes. Fresh foreign fund inflow… [+3319 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Amsan
articles.title: Despite rain and a fumble, Jyothi races to gold in 100 m hurdles event, scripts history at Asian meet - The Indian Express
articles.description: Considered a special talent, the 23-year-old is the only woman in India to run sub-13 seconds, that too six times this year alone. In the heats at Bangkok, she had clocked 12.98 seconds.
articles.content: ON A wet track and in the pouring rain on Thursday, Indian track and field’s big hope Jyothi Yarraji won the country’s first-ever gold in the women’s 100 metre hurdles at the Asian Athletics Champion… [+4609 chars]
